properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_CATEGORY , NOTICE_TITLE , UUSER_NAME , NOTICE_CREATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON(UUSER_NAME = USER_NO) WHERE N.USER_ADMIN = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_CREATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE USER_ADMIN = 'Y' OR USER_ADMIN = NULL
